name: Response Data Communications Ltd
tag_list: voice-mobility, call-centre, voip, contact-centre, unified-communications, wan-optimisation
overview:
Response Data Communications are a leading EMAS reseller for Shoretel and Silver Peak systems

Response Data Communications Ltd are a leading EMEA Reseller Partner for ShoreTel (The Fastest Growing IP PBX Company in the World), SilverPeak (Leaders in Data Centre Class WAN Optimisation) and Isilon Systems (Gartner MQ Leader in Midrange to High-End NAS).

Understanding the demands placed upon todays Enterprise Organisations to deliver both cost savings competitive advantage through strategic use of efficient IT and Communications, we deliver Word Class Solutions and Service.

Specialities: ShoreTel VoIP & Unified Communiations, Silver-Peak Data Centre Class WAN Optimisation and Isilon Scale-Out Storage 2.0

offices.address1: Unit D West Side Business Centre
